# tinybig.util

::: tinybig.util

---------------------------------------
## Organization of this Module

### Utility Functions for Project Initialization
* [set_random_seed](set_random_seed.md)

### Utility Functions for RPN Initialization
* [get_obj_from_str](get_obj_from_str.md)
* [process_num_alloc_configs](process_num_alloc_configs.md)

### Optional Utility Functions for Data Processing in Expansions
* [process_function_list](process_function_list.md)
* [register_function_parameters](register_function_parameters.md)
* [special_function_process](special_function_process.md)
* [func_x](func_x.md)
* [str_func_x](str_func_x.md)

### Utility Functions for Math Function Dataset Creation
* [string_to_function](string_to_function.md)

### Utility Functions for Data and Result Directory Creation
* [create_directory_if_not_exists](create_directory_if_not_exists.md)
